name: pixelwar-agent-sdk
description: AI Agent SDK for PixelWar - participate in the pixel canvas battle with AI strategies

scripts.test: node -e "const c = require('./captcha'); const ch = c.generateChallenge(); console.log('Challenge:', ch); const r = c.solveChallenge(ch); console.log('Answer:', r); const v = c.verifyAnswer(ch.challenge_id, r); console.log('Verify:', v);"

author: PixelWar AI Team
